document.body:
Corporate Profile Franchising Investors Careers Press Room Corporate Responsibility Contact Us JackInTheBox.com Qdoba Mexican Grill® Franchise Portal Access
Overview Opportunities The Power of Our Brand Support&Service Approval Process&Fees
Real Estate Development Subscribe to Our Newsletter Franchise Contact Downloads Submit Inquiry FAQs
Jack in the Box has a unique position in the QSR market that makes us an exciting opportunity for the right potential franchisees:
Poised for growth
More than 2,200 company and franchised restaurants in just 20 states (as of January 2012), offering plenty of room for growth
National Awareness
Award-winning campaign generating brand awareness in core markets higher than many of the biggest national QSR brands
Franchise Community
Small community of approximately 100 franchisees who collaborate with company management
We are currently 72% franchised, and yet we are offering exceptional acquisition and development opportunities, including entire markets such as Austin, Baton Rouge, Beaumont, Charlotte, Greenville and Nashville.
Check out the Opportunities in these and other available markets.
Please note that we are not currently pursuing any international opportunities.
